**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 35 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 [Lazurite-Infused Stone Golem](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1572) **Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 45 **Perception** +22 **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28 **Str** +8 **Dex** -1 **Con** +5 **Int** -5 **Wis** +0 **Cha** -5 --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +19 **Will** +20 **HP** 195 **Immunities** [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), magic (see below), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **[Golem Antimagic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=57)** harmed by [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) and [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) (5d10, 2d8 from areas and [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)); healed by [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) (area 2d8 HP); slowed by [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55)
**Necrotic Field** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 30 feet. [Positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) energy effects within the golem's necrotic field deal only half their normal damage. Additionally, all [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) within its aura deal an additional 1d6 negative damage with their natural attacks.
**Vulnerable to Stone to Flesh** a [_stone to flesh_](/Spells.aspx?ID=311) spell negates the golem's antimagic and its resistance to physical damage for 1 round. A [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123) spell reverses this effect immediately.
 --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** fist +26 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+11 bludgeoning plus 2d6 negative **Inexorable March** The golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can bar the way by succeeding at a DC 36 Fortitude save. On a critical success, the resisting creature takes no damage; otherwise, it takes damage equal to that dealt by the golem's fist Strike. **Necrotic Affliction** ([Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Trigger** The golem hits a [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) creature. **Effect** The creature must succeed at a DC 34 Fortitude save or become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (or drained 2 on a critical failure) as the golem's lazurite leeches vital energies and causes wounds to rot. **Necrotic Pulse** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) Each creature in a 10-foot emanation must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or take 1d6 [persistent necrotic damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and be [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 minute as their flesh and bones temporarily atrophy. The golem can't use Necrotic Pulse again for 1d4 rounds.
name: Lazurite-Infused Stone Golem
